subject: Order #SSN3471
description_text:
Hey!

Can I get an update about my order anytime soon?

Thank you very much!

Order #SSN3471
Confirmed on 14th November

Sincerely,

Horváth Gergő

conversations.body_text: Hi Gergő Horváth,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the logistics delay. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with restocking expected to be completed by the 28th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees.
